title: Topic 004 Question 061
body: You have an Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) v2 tier named AG1 on an Azure application gateway. AG1 has a policy named Policy1.
You need to add a custom rule to Policy1. The rule must block all requests from IP addresses in a specific IP address range.
Which four PowerShell cmdlets should you run in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate cmdlets from the list of cmdlets to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
